No insult indended Please. If you are so confident in your work, then why no SSs? There are none here, and I've heard that whole "best available" comment from you before with Cabin in the Woods iirc. Which btw, I am still waiting for a decent copy of that. I know you just clean up the files and try your best, but with your reputation, skull, and the rep of TPB in general in jeopardy, I think you should probably step up and start doin a little better to sell your product to us. The spammers and fakers have caught up to the legit providers a long time ago as far as output is concerned. So please, if your going to claim best quality, put up screens, because first cuts will at least put up screens for us to judge whether or not its worth it. Put up something for us to compare and contrast.
